item.title: My Personal Productivity Guide
item.description: Being self-employed and service based has been a rewarding experience, but let’s be honest.. it’s a constant grind. You are either swamped with work, or you are worrying about being homeless. Yes I am exaggerating a bit, but the point that I am trying to make is the lack of consistency. This lack of consistency can be the deciding factor for most self-employed folks to throw in the towel and get a “real” job (as my family would often remind me).
